title: EDF spins floating wind potential of Blyth offshore project
lead: The project is set to be one of the first floating offshore wind farms in English waters

title: Solar goes big down under!
lead: Australia to build world’s ‘biggest’ solar and battery project and export AUD$1 billion worth of electricity

title: 4 Ways to Remove the Headache of a Sustainability Audit
lead: The mere mention of the word audit is usually enough to send sustainability managers into a spin.

title: Amazon ‘surpassed Google and Facebook in renewable PPAs in 2020’
lead: The tech giant has purchased over 7.5GW of renewable energy to date

title: Nigeria partners with World Economic Forum to fight plastic pollution
lead: In 2018, Nigeria was estimated to have discharged around 200,000 tonnes of plastic waste into the ocean per year, while its annual plastics production is projected to grow to 523,000 tonnes by 2022

title: Shell launches Celtic Sea floating wind farm
lead: The farm will have a total capacity of up to 1GW, equivalent to powering 800,000 homes

title: Biden wants carbon free electricity by 2035
lead: New President commits to ‘carbon pollution-free’ power sector hitting net zero by 2050

title: India and IEA deepen partnership on energy security and clean energy
lead: India’s demand for energy is set to grow rapidly in the coming decades, with electricity use set to increase particularly fast

title: Green Network Energy and Simplicity Energy go bust
lead: The closures are forecast to affect around 410,000 domestic customers

title: EU supercharges battery tech research by €2.9bn
lead: The scheme will support technological breakthroughs for entire battery ecosystem
